divs: Sighting DetailsWhile reviewing recorded video of the previous few days I noticed this object "pop in" to a cloudless sky. It hovered near but not directly over a new microwave cell phone relay tower recently installed by Verizon for 2-3 minutes while pulsating then faded out with 2 short flashes. Video available.
trends: There have been no other sightings in johnson valley
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
